hasGoodie

public boolean hasGoodie(Position position)
the hasGoodie method always returns false because there are no items for the MouseHero to pick up.

Specified by:
hasGoodie in class Avatar
Parameters:
position - represents the position of the MouseHero on the Board
Returns:

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
the toString method return the character "m" to show were the MouseHero is on the board and if the MouseHero is on the same Tile as a MouseTrap, it will then display a "M" instead.

Overrides:
toString in class Tile
Returns:
a string "m" if normal case, but returns "M" if the MouseHero is on the same Tile as a MouseTrap

collidesWith

public boolean collidesWith(Avatar avatar)
the collidesWith method uses the parameter avatar and checks to see if MouseHero an instance of Mouse and if it is, it will remove a life of the Mouse Hero

Specified by:
collidesWith in class Avatar
Parameters:
avatar - is who the MouseHero has collided with
Returns:
true if the MouseHero collided with a Mouse, otherwise it returns false.
